A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Riddled with plot holes\, villians are shallow and lack menace\, good guys are equally lacking in substance and don't seem to have a goal or.mission. there's a full half hour excursion that could be entirely cut and the film would lose nothing. I wish the good guys had all died so it would be over and we wouldn't be subjected to a third film. Seriously\, do not waste your time or money.
